alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 11:59PM EDT until July 19 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Central Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1058 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Charleston, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, East Prairie, Clinton, Bardwell, Bertrand, Wyatt, Anniston, Fulgham, Arlington, Columbus, Diehlstadt and Wilson City. This includes Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 4 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
